Translations.Text: Kamoe bri wahyu ubak ma gata

Tatiek jih sigra lam tong takeubah Tatiek tong lam krueng jiba u bineh Sinan na soe preh jicok jih bagah Musoh lon nyang cok ngon musoh jih nyan Jigaseh jih nyan sayangjih leupah Ka lon tiek gaseh bak jih keu gata Nyak jipeulihara gata jipapah Lon ngieng ngon kalon na jihiroteuh

Youh nyan cutdateuh keunan geulangkah Geukheun bak lon na si tem peulihara Keunoe jeuet taba bek le takeubah ` Kamoe peuwoe treuk gata bak mateuh ; Seunang that mateuh hana le susah Teuma na ureueng nyang tapoh mate Kamoe puweh le gata meupeuglah Mangat bek susah gata deungon nyan Teuma ujian gata le leupah Mewuji gata ngon peungalaman Teuma u Madyan keudeh talangkah Padum thon sabe gata di sinan Teuma ‘oh Iheueh nyan mubri peurintah Teuma troh gata laju hai Musa Bak watee kada teupat that leupah
Lon peujeuet gata keu utusan Lon Geunantoe droe Lon jak ba peurintah
Tajak ngon aduenteuh jinoe gata Ayat Lon taba dum tajak peugah Bek lalee gata taingat keu Lon
Ubak Peuraʻeun jinoe talangkah Sabab Peuraʻeun ka darohaka Peue-peue nyang hawa jipeubuet sudah
Tapeugah beu got le gata dua Bek narit gasa nyang jeuet keusalah Kadang pih jitem jeuet keu peuingat Got pih jitakot watee tapeugah
Kheun gopnyan dua wahe Po kamoe Teumakot kamoe kamoe jigagah Teumakot kamoe keu jielanya Get darohaka pih jih keu Allah
Neukheun bek yoteuh Lon sajan gata Lon deungo nyata peue nyang jipeugah Lon kalon keudroe bandum perkara

Tajak banduateuh laju bagah Tapeugah kamoe Rasul Po gata Neuyue bak gata keu noe meulangkah Bani Israil tajok keu kamoe Bek le lagee nyou buetteuh that salah Bek taazeueb dum Bani Israil Kamoe ba dalil Neubri le Allah Kamcoe ba ayat nibak Po gata Salam seujahtra soe ikot Allah Soe nyang tem ikot peutunyok Tuhan
Meunyo kon meunan azeueb that leupah Ka Neubri wahyu bak kamoe dua Raya that seksa si nyang buet salah À Si nyang han pateh ji paleng muka
Peuraʻeun sigra teuma jipeugah Boh soe Tuhanteuh gata bandua Peugah hai Musa bak lon beu bagah
Geukheun Po kamoe nyang bri peuneujeuet ‘Oh Iheueh Neupeujeuet Neubri hidayah Bandum makhluk peuneujeuet Tuhan
Seuot Peuraʻeun tacuba peugah Pakriban dilee dum ureueng jameun
